rows.label: soul09_P0101
rows.name: Strike first and strike hard!

rows.label: soul09_P0102
rows.name: Move in! Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul09_P0103
rows.name:
Close in and grab this bull
by the horns!

rows.label: soul09_P0201
rows.name: Attack from range! Follow me!

rows.label: soul09_P0202
rows.name: Don't forget to buff up!

rows.label: soul09_P0203
rows.name:
Weaken them and wear them
down!

rows.label: soul09_P0301
rows.name: It's on now! Close the distance!

rows.label: soul09_P0302
rows.name:
Here we go. Open fire and
cover me!

rows.label: soul09_P0303
rows.name:
Tactics matter! Prep yourself
with an aura!

rows.label: soul09_P0401
rows.name: I need healing!

rows.label: soul09_P0402
rows.name: Little help here?

rows.label: soul09_P0403
rows.name: I'm still in this. Give me a boost!

rows.label: soul09_P0501
rows.name:
I think I've hit my limit.
Heal me!

rows.label: soul09_P0502
rows.name:
I have to keep fighting.
Patch me up!

rows.label: soul09_P0503
rows.name:
It's not worth healing me. Just
buff us up and keep fighting!

rows.label: soul09_P0601
rows.name:
It's in your hands now...
Strike, and strike hard!

rows.label: soul09_P0602
rows.name:
Forget me! Just blast them
while you can!

rows.label: soul09_P0603
rows.name:
Let me see one last aura
before I go...

rows.label: soul09_P0701
rows.name:
Now! Follow with a real
bone crusher!

rows.label: soul09_P0702
rows.name:
It's working! Follow with
some gunfire!

rows.label: soul09_P0703
rows.name:
There! Now you can
weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul09_P0801
rows.name:
Got an appendage! Step in
and use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul09_P0802
rows.name:
Opportunity knocks!
Topple 'em with gunfire!

rows.label: soul09_P0803
rows.name:
That's gotta hurt.
Now cripple 'em!

rows.label: soul09_P0901
rows.name:
That's it. Now smack that
giant good!

rows.label: soul09_P0902
rows.name:
We need more power to
tackle a heavyweight like this!

rows.label: soul09_P0903
rows.name:
Don't let 'em faze ya.
Remember we have Overclock!

rows.label: soul09_P1001
rows.name: Yes! Now tackle it up close!

rows.label: soul09_P1002
rows.name:
Take aim now!
We've got a shot!

rows.label: soul09_P1003
rows.name: Yes! Now weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul09_P1101
rows.name:
Focus your mind and put up
an aura!

rows.label: soul09_P1102
rows.name:
Don't just attack blindly!
Use an aura!

rows.label: soul09_P1103
rows.name: Don't lose morale. Buff up!

rows.label: soul09_P1201
rows.name: Let's finish this. Who's with me?

rows.label: soul09_P1202
rows.name:
Send a whole armyâ€”
you can't stop me! Overclock!

rows.label: soul09_P1203
rows.name:
It's now or never!
Gird yourself with an aura!

rows.label: soul09_C0101
rows.name:
No resting! Step in and face
the next one!

rows.label: soul09_C0102
rows.name: Don't let up! Gunfire!

rows.label: soul09_C0103
rows.name:
More on the way.
Buff up and get ready!

rows.label: soul09_C0201
rows.name:
You can't even touch me.
Use an aura!

rows.label: soul09_C0202
rows.name:
I'm practically invisible!
Buff up and confuse 'em!

rows.label: soul09_C0203
rows.name:
If only lightning were this fast.
Now pump 'em with lead!

rows.label: soul09_C0301
rows.name:
They're wide open!
Move in for a melee attack!

rows.label: soul09_C0302
rows.name:
Yeeeesss! Now fire and
keep firing!

rows.label: soul09_C0303
rows.name:
That felt good.
Now jump in there!

rows.label: soul09_C0401
rows.name:
The weather's turning.
Buff up and brace yourselves!

rows.label: soul09_C0402
rows.name:
Ready your auras! You can't
trifle with Mira's weather.

rows.label: soul09_C0403
rows.name:
Weaken 'em and let THEM
deal with this weather!

rows.label: soul09_C0501
rows.name:
Now THIS is what I call
running. Buff us up!

rows.label: soul09_C0502
rows.name:
Heh, they'll never catch me.
Give us some more buffs!

rows.label: soul09_C0503
rows.name:
New strategy! Get your
Overclock ready!

rows.label: soul09_C0601
rows.name:
Thanks. Now get back in
there and show them!

rows.label: soul09_C0602
rows.name:
Impeccable timing. Let's see what
you can do with that firearm!

rows.label: soul09_C0603
rows.name:
Thanks! Now get an
aura ready!

rows.label: soul09_C0701
rows.name:
You're like the wind in my sails.
Now buff us up!

rows.label: soul09_C0702
rows.name:
You're too kind.
Break out those buffs!

rows.label: soul09_C0703
rows.name:
Don't get yourself hurt.
Where's your aura?

rows.label: soul09_C0801
rows.name:
Looks like we'll have to bust
our way out of this!

rows.label: soul09_C0802
rows.name:
I refuse to retreat.
Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul09_C0803
rows.name:
Buff me up! I can fight my
way out of this!

rows.label: soul09_C0901
rows.name: Fire! We'll catch 'em off guard!

rows.label: soul09_C0902
rows.name:
I'm attacking from higher
ground! Cover fire!

rows.label: soul09_C0903
rows.name:
Fire away. I'll keep 'em
pinned down!

rows.label: soul09_C1001
rows.name:
Now's your chance.
Lay into them!

rows.label: soul09_C1002
rows.name: Got 'em! Now blast 'em to bits!

rows.label: soul09_C1003
rows.name:
This is our chance to
weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul09_C1101
rows.name:
That should stop 'em.
Now move in and attack!

rows.label: soul09_C1102
rows.name: Stopped 'em cold! Take aim!

rows.label: soul09_C1103
rows.name:
They're not going anywhere.
Cripple 'em!

rows.label: soul09_C1201
rows.name:
Asleep on the job? Someone
could use a good wake-up slap!

rows.label: soul09_C1202
rows.name:
Look at this lazy slob. Wake
'em up with a few bullets!

rows.label: soul09_C1203
rows.name:
A good-morning melee strike
should do the trick!

rows.label: soul09_C1301
rows.name:
Got 'em! Strike while the
iron's hot!

rows.label: soul09_C1302
rows.name: I'll hold 'em, you blast 'em!

rows.label: soul09_C1303
rows.name:
The enemy's restrained! Close
in and keep it that way!

rows.label: soul09_C1401
rows.name:
Damage sustained...
Patch me up, quick!

rows.label: soul09_C1402
rows.name:
Never mind the damage.
Step in and counterattack!

rows.label: soul09_C1403
rows.name:
I'm hit! Screen me with some
cover fire!

rows.label: soul09_C1501
rows.name:
Damn! Heal up so we can
strike back!

rows.label: soul09_C1502
rows.name:
Dammit! Buff us up and let's
turn this around!

rows.label: soul09_C1503
rows.name:
Forget about me! Just kick it
into Overclock!

rows.label: soul09_C1601
rows.name:
Low fuel! A buff might tide
me over!

rows.label: soul09_C1602
rows.name: Fuel's running low. I need a fix!

rows.label: soul09_C1603
rows.name:
Can you patch me up?
I'm running on fumes!
